Eurosystem staff macroeconomic projections for the euro area (Dec 2017) https://t.co/dqxo3GPdUY Charts and tables https://t.co/G5QbpkNiMQ
Draghi: We haven't discussed a sudden stop of asset purchases or tapering
Draghi: Independence of statistical institutions and their people is of the essence for the credibility of data on which monetary policy is designed and decided
Draghi: We have our views about what should be done about the eurozone but of course we are entirely in the hands of the citizens on how to pursue this in a democratic way
Draghi: Raising interest rates in the future would be good news because it would show inflation is on the path to being self-sustained
Draghi: Reported losses in Steinhoff case are exaggerated
Draghi: We are very transparent on our purchase programme
Draghi: We are certainly more confident today than we were two months ago. The strengthening of the economy is the basis on which the output gap will close.
Introductory statement Mario Draghi to the press conference https://t.co/e3Ip6r905e
Draghi: The Governing Council welcomes the ongoing discussions on completing banking union and the capital markets union
Draghi: Regarding fiscal policies, the increasingly solid and broad-based expansion strengthens the case for rebuilding fiscal buffers, especially in countries where government debt remains high
Draghi: HICP projections: 1.5% in 2017 [1.5% in Sept], 1.4% in 2018 [1.2%], 1.5% in 2019 [1.5%] and 1.7% in 2020
Draghi: GDP projections: 2.4% in 2017 [2.2% in Sept], 2.3% in 2018 [1.8%], 1.9 in 2019 [1.7%] and 1.7% in 2020
Draghi: Domestic price pressures remain muted overall and have yet to show convincing signs of a sustained upward trend
Draghi: The strong cyclical momentum and the significant reduction of economic slack give grounds for greater confidence that inflation will converge towards our inflation aim
Draghi: We confirm that from January 2018 we will make net asset purchases under the APP, at a monthly pace of €30 billion, until the end of September 2018, or beyond, if necessary
